wordpressPost.title: (Part-Time) Information Security Compliance Officer at WeSpire
wordpressPost.content:
About Us:

Since 2012, WeSpire has been helping the world’s forward-thinking companies inspire their people and transform their businesses. Fortune 500 companies use WeSpire, a private-label, SaaS employee engagement platform, to run a broad range of digital sustainability, wellbeing, volunteering and other positive business programs that empower employees to take positive actions, measure results and build a culture of sustainability and corporate social responsibility.

About You:

We are looking for a part-time Compliance Officer to help us with policy updates and client requests. This role is expected to be part-time (10 hours a week or so) with some extra time needed during certain peak sales and audit periods.

Responsibilities:
  • Overhaul our information security policies to make them easily accessible to auditors and internal compliance stakeholders
  • Write and maintain all new policy documentation required by customers and by new Privacy Regulations (GDPR, CCPA)
  • Spearhead completion of a BitSig, SigLite, or CAIQ
  • Respond to client questionnaires regarding compliance with security requirements.
  • Review AWS and Heroku SOC2 certifications and CAIQ for answers to customer compliance requirements
  • Advise on security impact of company strategic and technical decisions
  • Coordinate yearly penetration testing
  • Advise on yearly company security training

If interested, please email a cover letter and resume to Kim Pelzar at kim.pelzar@wespire.com.
